KR: 하하.. 스캇이 말한 대로 진짜 너 말도 안 되게 강하구나? {nl}우드스피릿을 이렇게 빨리 쓰러뜨릴 거라곤 진짜 생각도 못 했어.{nl}덕분에 너에게 빚을 졌어. 정말 고마워! 나중에 꼭 다시 만나자고!
EN: Mother .. true of you as Scott said river estuary If the story? {Nl} all that defeat so soon the Woodspirit was no real thought. Thanks to the {nl}, I got you on the debt. Thanks so much! Always wait'll meet you later!
